title: Games and pastimes
brief_description: Top spinning competitions; kiteflying - often with elaborately painted kites; a type of football played with a woven cane ball; a form of self-defence, once serious and now a sport; traditional dances and new dances in traditional style; all a part of the leisure of Malayans, young and old.
